name: Help Meowt! Space VR
description:
This game was developed for play with the HTC Vive and is a submission for the 2019 Indie Galactic Space Jam.

Help Meowt! Space VR is a two-player co-op space simulation VR game. Play as two cat-stronauts on The Milk Saucer working together to fix up your ship after space junk knocked out critical systems.

The VR player outside makes physical repairs, while the computer player inside assists the VR player from the ship dashboard.

Team (AT)2:

Andrew Chok: Lead programming

April Almafitano: Concept art, 3d art

Thi Tran: Tech art, dashboard UI & programming

Tho Tran: UI, graphics, design

Brian Luft: Sound design
